Build ID: M20071023-1652

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Eclipse 3.3.1.1 with CDT 4.0.2-I200711230800
2. New -> Project -> C project -> Makefile project -> -- Other  Toolchain --
3. Open Properties of created proejct -> C/C++ Build -> Tool chain editor
4. Error Window: "An error has occurred. See error log for more details.
java.lang.NullPointerException"

I'm using CDT with external make envinroment. With CDT4.0.1 it works. See attached error log:
